item.title: Industrial Communication Networks
item.description: Bases Transmission Methods: analog / digital Types: simplex / half duplex / full duplex + serial / parallel + synchronous / asynchronous For reasons of cost and durability, most communication networks use half duplex asynchronous serial digital transmission.
